articles.title: Asian Stocks Retreat at Open After US Tech Selloff: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian equities came under pressure after a tech selloff hit Wall Street Friday, with chip shares among the losers. Hong Kong was an outlier as Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. surged.
